features.featureTitle: In the final step of the bottom "OneMoreThingInteraction" reveal (after the third click), display the user-provided uploaded image (original filename: "627674318_941888025190821_1390922055753035112_n.jpg") instead of any placeholder/random image, by ensuring the correct file exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with a clean stable filename and that `frontend/src/components/OneMoreThingInteraction.tsx` references that exact public URL.
